c1.name: Fatal Acceleration
c1.descriptionRaw:
Upon scoring a CRIT Hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.
Can only occur once every 5s.
c1.description:
Upon scoring a CRIT Hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.
Can only occur once every 5s.

c2.name: Impromptu Opening
c2.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Riff Revolution</color>'s Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.
c2.description: Riff Revolution's Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

c3.name: Double-Stop
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Fervor</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Sweeping Fervor by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Wildfire Rhythm
c4.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Fervor</color>'s swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.
c4.description: Sweeping Fervor's swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

c5.name: Screamin' for an Encore
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Riff Revolution</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Riff Revolution by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rockin' in a Flaming World
c6.descriptionRaw: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK Bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.
c6.description: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK Bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.
